episodes.title: Robin Williams, Mother God and Alcohol As Medicine: Inside The Deadly Cult- Love Has Won
episodes.description: Lo is doing a deep dive into the wild world of cults. He is joined by fellow crime junkie kween- actress and singer Hayley Orrantia. The 2 friends get on the mic to discuss mental health, overpriced Christmas trees and the latest binge worthy documentary trending world wide. The new HBO doc "Love Has Won: The Cult of Mother God" , is Amy Carlson's bizarre cult, which ultimately killed her. She created a palace of lies that she could not escape from and utilized social media to spread her message to thousands of people. Hayley and Lo examine the strange life and death of a modern- day spiritual leader. Buckle up putas...you're in for a wild ride on this one Stay Connected to The Lo Life!
